Classes/BMLT_MeetingSearch_Prefs/PrefsKe.name: GracePeriod
Classes/BMLT_MeetingSearch_Prefs/PrefsKe.abstract: This represents how long we allow a meeting to be in progress before we remove it from our list of candidates.

Classes/BMLT_MeetingSearch_Prefs/PrefsKe.name: DistanceUnits
Classes/BMLT_MeetingSearch_Prefs/PrefsKe.abstract: This represents the units we use for our distance display. The string that is stored and returned in the localization key, not the displayed string.

Classes/BMLT_MeetingSearch_Prefs/PrefsKe.name: ResultSort
Classes/BMLT_MeetingSearch_Prefs/PrefsKe.abstract: This dictates how the results are sorted. If 0, then they are sorted by time. If 1, they are sorted by distance.

Classes/BMLT_MeetingSearch_Prefs/PrefsKe.name: DisplayMapType
Classes/BMLT_MeetingSearch_Prefs/PrefsKe.abstract: In the More Info screen, the user can select a map type. This is saved here. 0 = standard, 1 = hybrid, 2 = satellite.

Classes/BMLT_MeetingSearch_Prefs/PrefsKe.name: CanUseGoogleMaps
Classes/BMLT_MeetingSearch_Prefs/PrefsKe.abstract: In the meeting details screen, we can possibly access the Google Maps App (if installed).

Classes/BMLT_MeetingSearch_Prefs/PrefsKe.name: AutoSearchValue
Classes/BMLT_MeetingSearch_Prefs/PrefsKe.abstract: We can determine the density of the response when Auto is selected.

Classes/BMLT_MeetingSearch_Prefs/PrefsKe.name: DefaultDistanceValue
Classes/BMLT_MeetingSearch_Prefs/PrefsKe.abstract: This is the number of miles/kilometers to use for initial distance displays.

Classes/BMLT_MeetingSearch_Prefs.html#/s.abstract: Should we sort meetings by distance? If false, we sort by day and time. Default is false.
